skins.selfIntroduction: I am a modified Dido-class... rather was it Bellona-class? ... Right then, you could say I'm quite well-travelled. Will you be sending me all over the world too?
skins.acquisition: Err, you're... the Commander, yes? You don't know who I am? Ah, right, I've yet to introduce myself... I'm Black Prince of the Royal Navy... Will that suffice?
skins.login: Commander, back again same time as always, eh?
skins.details: I am the Longbow of Cr¨¦cy, and the Shield of the Realm... By your will, I am at your disposal.
skins.secretaryIdle1: A Maid? Me? Certainly not... But I do know how to make some simple dishes, and I suppose I could bring you some tea.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I can see the water from here. Commander, do you like the ocean?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, are you daydreaming? What say... I join you and we daydream together?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander? Something about my body caught your attention, did it?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, does that feel nice to... touch?

skins.shipDescription: Sorry to keep you waiting, Commander. Thank you very much for taking me on vacation. Standing in front of you like this... is a little embarrassing... Nevertheless, what do you think of... my swimsuit?
skins.acquisition: Sorry to keep you waiting, Commander. Thank you very much for taking me on vacation. Standing in front of you like this... is a little embarrassing... Nevertheless, what do you think of... my swimsuit?
skins.login: I didn't think this swimsuit stood out, so I was surprised when you still found me right away...
skins.details: Oh, is it that time already? I've prepared a few simple dishes. Commander, shall we invite the others to join us?
skins.secretaryIdle1: The sea is a tempestuous battlefield, and yet the beach is a relaxing Eden. What an incredible duality.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Beach volleyball? I've heard it's quite fun. Do you think I could give it a try?
skins.secretaryIdle3: The sand is so soft, so fine. It feels so pleasant between my toes...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, the others are still here.

skins.shipDescription: A "qipao," is it? This legendary dress from the Dragon Empery... Putting it on and enjoying some nostalgic music, makes me... Ahhh... Commander, might we relax like this a bit longer...?
